hero.title: SOBODH JAGARAN
hero.subtitle: POLYGLOT FULL-STACK DEVELOPER & SYSTEMS ARCHITECT
hero.slogan: Don't Just Write Code. Architect Reliability.

summary.title: EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
paragraphs: Polyglot Full-Stack Developer with 10+ years of experience architecting scalable systems, integrating complex enterprise technologies, and automating mission-critical workflows. Experience in the electronic manufacturing industry has instilled a development approach rooted in **precision, stability, and long-term reliability.**

I specialize in turning ambiguous requirements into clean, maintainable solutions—ranging from enterprise back-end platforms and modern front-end applications to internal tools focused on data scraping, sniffing, replication, and ETL processing.

experience.title: ENTERPRISE PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
experience.intro_note: Below is a chronological list of professional roles detailing full-stack development, systems integration, and maintenance contributions. Due to the proprietary nature of this work, client links are omitted.

items.title: Nortech International
items.target: Senior Software Developer | Electronics and Software Solutions
items.description:
* Full-stack software design, development, and integration for various platforms, including **web, desktop, and mobile** applications.
* Specialized in **hardware integration into software systems** to enhance product functionality and data processing.
* Responsible for the **maintenance and modernization of legacy/old code bases**, ensuring system stability, security, and performance.
* Contributed to the development lifecycle across all stages (design, coding, integration, and deployment).
* Continuous application of expertise in **C#, .Net Core, Java, PHP/Laravel, and JavaScript** across all projects.

items.title: Lemonaide Ltd
items.target: Software Developer | Software Development & Financial Crime
items.description:
* Full-stack development, maintenance, and system analysis using **C#, .Net Framework, and .Net Core**.
* Built the **SmartKos** e-commerce and delivery application **solo in 3 months** (ASP.NET Core 2, Azure SQL DB), including a web scrapping tool to gather product data from major retailers.
* Provided crucial QA and integration support on the **Honeycomb Application** (FIC compliance system) and the **UWE/Uwe Assist** project (Raspberry Pi/scale integration).
* Completed and built the **Boskruin Butchery** e-commerce store and successfully resolved all outstanding requirements and bugs for the **Fleetwach** web/mobile app.
* Provided high-level support and mentorship to a junior developer, tackling complex implementation challenges.

items.title: Hellomarketing
items.description:
* Managed full-stack development, maintenance, and hosting infrastructure for multiple web properties and mobile applications.
* Designed and built the **B4B Door Knocker Mobile App** (Android/iOS) using **Ionic framework** and a **Slim PHP API** to capture and manage leads via the **Salesforce CRM**.
* Developed a CRM-like website feature and a web-based search engine using the **Laravel PHP Framework** and **MySQL**.
* Engineered a data processing solution using a **Java script/algorithm** to sort, check, and validate over **3 million lead records** from spreadsheets before database entry.

items.title: Tanjent Ltd
items.target: Developer | Web Development & Social Media Marketing
items.description:
* Built from scratch a Mobile App for a Small Poker League Tournament using the **Ionic framework** and **Firebase**.
* Developed and worked on various websites using **Opencart** and **WordPress**.
* Contributed to the first phase development of the **Versofy** website before relocating.

items.title: STS
items.description: * Performed software testing (manual and automation) using **Selenium and Java**.

footer.message: Problem-solving, architectural clarity, and system reliability define my engineering approach. Let's discuss how my 10+ years of polyglot experience can deliver a robust solution for you.
